Name: plastic flake production, consumer electronics, for recycling, by grinding/shredding, formal sector | plastic flake, consumer electronics, for recycling | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description: The technology that is used in the formal sector is standard and is uniformly adopted by all the formal recyclers. The equipment is maintained and is not of very old technology.
